title: DoorDash to Buy Finland Food-Delivery Startup in Deal Valued Above $8 Billion
sub_head: Deal to acquire Wolt comes amid a wave of consolidation in the competitive food-delivery segment
body:
DoorDash Inc. said it has agreed to acquire European food-delivery company Wolt Enterprises Oy in an all-stock deal valued at over $8 billion.
The deal marks the latest merger in the highly competitive food-delivery space, where revenue has skyrocketed during the coronavirus pandemic but profit has been elusive. Last year, Grubhub Inc. agreed to merge with Europeâ€™s Just Eat Takeaway.com N.V., and Uber Technologies Inc. bought smaller rival Postmates Inc.
